facts.text: I'm covered in sparkly blue and gold spots! I shimmer like a jewel.
I have a black stripe through my eye and a big black spot on my side!
Both mom and dad guard the eggs and babies together! We're great parents.
I come from the warm rivers of Venezuela and Colombia!
I'm shy and gentle, unlike many of my aggressive cichlid cousins!

profile.habitat: Slow-moving rivers in Venezuela and Colombia
profile.diet: Small invertebrates, worms, and plant matter
